Professional Development

AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner

IN PROGRESS

I am currently preparing for the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam as part of my Engineering degree program. Although I regularly use Route 53 and CloudFront at work and am familiar with cloud computing, this preparation is helping me solidify my foundational knowledge.

AWSCloud ComputingVirtualizationRoute 53Cloud ArchitectureServerlessCloudfront
Amazon Web Services

Cyber and Network Security Professional

2021

During my time at Mailchimp, I frequently handled issues related to trust & safety, compromised accounts, phishing campaigns, social engineering, and spoofing. When the COVID-19 pandemic began, these problems rapidly evolved.

To build on this professional experience and gain a deeper understanding of the changing security landscape, I completed a 6-month Cybersecurity course through Georgia Tech’s Professional Education division.

Network SecurityCybersecurityLinux AdministrationGRCELK StackAzure
Georgia Institute of Technology
